getArguments

Object[] getArguments(Class<? extends Annotation> annotationType)
Returns the arguments for this test step which were marked with the given Annotation. Use null as parameter to retrieve the arguments for this test step which were not marked with any Annotation.

Parameters:
annotationType - Annotation the parameters were marked with. The annotation itself must be marked with the TestStepArgumentMarker annotation.
Returns:
The arguments for this test step which were marked with the given Annotation, possibly an empty array, but never null.
